title: Datomic is Free
dot:
digraph G{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12, color=lightblue, fontcolor=black];edge[color=gray, arrowhead=vee];Announcement[label="Announcement
27 April 2023", color=lightgreen];DatomicFree[label="Datomic now free
under Apache 2.0 License", color=lightyellow];Availability[label="Available via
Maven Central & AWS Marketplace", color=lightyellow];Goal[label="Goal: Expand Datomic & Clojure community", color=lightyellow];FAQ[label="FAQ", shape=underline, color=lightgray];CurrentAgreements[label="Current agreements
continue in full effect", color=lightcyan];SupportOptions[label="Paid enterprise support
available", color=lightcyan];FreeEditions[label="All editions of Datomic
will be free", color=lightcyan];ApacheLicense[label="Why Apache 2.0?
More useful for more people", color=lightcyan];OpenSource[label="Not Open Source
but Apache 2.0 rights apply", color=lightcyan];ProSupport[label="Pro support
(2 day SLA business hour)
continues", color=lightcyan];EnterpriseSupport[label="Enterprise Support
available upon request", color=lightcyan];DatomicCloud[label="Datomic Cloud
now runnable off marketplace", color=lightcyan];Announcement->DatomicFree;Announcement->Availability;Announcement->Goal;Announcement->FAQ;FAQ->CurrentAgreements;FAQ->SupportOptions;FAQ->FreeEditions;FAQ->ApacheLicense;FAQ->OpenSource;FAQ->ProSupport;FAQ->EnterpriseSupport;FAQ->DatomicCloud;}

title: Colorado governor signs tractor right-to-repair law opposed by John Deere
dot: digraph G{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];subgraph cluster_0{label="Colorado Governor Signs Tractor Right-to-Repair Law";color=blue;style=filled;fontname="Arial";fontsize=14;"Colorado Governor Jared Polis"->"Signs Bill"[label="April 26, 2023"];"Signs Bill"->"Right-to-Repair Law"[label="First State Law"];"Right-to-Repair Law"->"Farm Equipment Manufacturers"[label="Must Provide:"];"Farm Equipment Manufacturers"->"Parts"[label="Fair and Reasonable Terms"];"Farm Equipment Manufacturers"->"Embedded Software"[label="Fair and Reasonable Terms"];"Farm Equipment Manufacturers"->"Documentation"[label="Fair and Reasonable Terms"];}subgraph cluster_1{label="John Deere's Opposition";color=red;style=filled;fontname="Arial";fontsize=14;"John Deere"->"Opposes Law"[label="Unnecessary, Unintended Consequences"];"Opposes Law"->"Supports Customers"[label="Self-Repair or Independent Services"];"Opposes Law"->"Class-Action Lawsuit"[label="Monopolization of Repair Services"];}subgraph cluster_2{label="Impact on Farmers";color=green;style=filled;fontname="Arial";fontsize=14;"Farmers"->"Independent Repair Shops"[label="Can Use"];"Independent Repair Shops"->"Diagnose and Repair Equipment"[label="Instead of Dealers"];"Farmers"->"Save Time and Money"[label="On Repairs"];}subgraph cluster_3{label="Future Implications";color=purple;style=filled;fontname="Arial";fontsize=14;"Colorado Law"->"Other States"[label="May Follow"];"Other States"->"Pending Tractor Right-to-Repair Bills"[label="15 States"];}"Right-to-Repair Law"->"John Deere"[style=dashed, color=red];"John Deere"->"Farmers"[style=dashed, color=green];"Farmers"->"Colorado Law"[style=dashed, color=blue];}

title: A visual book recommender
